          <title>
            <string language="fi">Reunan leikkaaminen 3</string>
            <string language="en">Edge-cutting 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rand-Ausschnitt 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bord-découpage 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Borda-corte 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bordo-taglio 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακρη-κοπή 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Borde-corte 3</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten kaksiosaisella valumuotilla tehdyn savityön reuna voidaan leikata.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how the edge of a ceramic work completed with a two-piece mould can be cut.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cutting</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">edge</string>
            <string language="en">ceramic</string>
            <string language="fi">kaksi-</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">tai</string>
            <string language="fi">valumuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">useampiosaiset</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie der Rand einer 
keramischen Arbeit, die mit einer zweiteiligen Form durchgeführt 
wird, geschnitten werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment le bord des travaux en 
céramique terminés un moule en deux pièces peut être coupé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a borda de um trabalho 
cerâmico terminado com um molde de duas partes pode ser cortada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come il bordo dei lavori 
di ceramica ultimati con una muffa a due pezzi può essere tagliato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς η άκρη μιας κεραμικής 
εργασίας που ολοκληρώνεται με μια two-piece φόρμα μπορεί να 
κοπεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo el borde de un trabajo 
de cerámica terminado con un molde de dos piezas puede ser cortado.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausschnitt</string>
